list_items: Update of the ‘Clear list’ function to ensure that IDs continue to be assigned in ascending order and to standardize the function across all platforms.
Added warning messages for renaming or deleting columns to prevent accidental actions.
Added SQL Joins in Peakboard Hub Data sources for enhanced data manipulation capabilities.
SQL-Count issues with various data types resolved.
Other users working with the same hub list are now displayed to improve collaboration.
Added real-time changes in lists with multiple users, allowing updates to be reflected instantly.
Deleting lists has been improved. The list and all references are now deleted in a single transaction.
Fixed issue with lists having a column named 'Order' causing errors in the Peakboard Designer.
Removed the possibility of using '.' symbol in list column names to ensure data integrity.
Fixed an issue with manually entering number values and clicking 'enter' to save.
Fixed UI issue, where the list value columns did not match the header columns.
Fixed issue, where unusable buttons would be shown in UI.
Adding a new list will now always return the correct ID.
Resolved error with entering number values outside constraints causing a bugged view.
Negative numbers cannot be used for the tick size in number constraints anymore.
Fixed bug where sometimes the wrong row could be deleted.
The rearrangement of columns is now retained as the user view.
Various UI improvements implemented.
Enhanced email security by adding organization and group names to the password reset emails.
Enabled setting of box groups without the 'Users' access right requirement.
Improved search functionality for users in groups, ensuring accurate results.
Fixed issue with changing user group hub list column permissions.
Added possibility to create a new group key for a user group.
Completed UI rework to enhance user experience and streamline navigation.
Fixed issue with access rights for connections.
Changed collapse Icon position for increased consistency in user interfaces.
Updated address in the imprint to reflect the new address.
Highlighted icons on hover and added descriptive text to enhance clarity.
Removed unused packages to optimize system security, performance and efficiency.
Added a new endpoint to retrieve the current Peakboard Hub version.
Enhanced the license expired dialog to allow users to add a new license.
Fixed browser inserting entries into password fields for editing boxes in user groups.
Added the ability to manage Peakboard Boxes via Hub authentication for improved security.
Increased the maximum file size for uploading applications to boxes to 20 MB.
Fixed issue where 'No global functions' would be shown besides available global functions.
Prevented update button from appearing for boxes already on set version.
Resolved issue with editing users & roles on boxes.
Fixed issue with adding a box to the hub when no Box ID is set.
Fixed an issue where updating the IP address via the host name sometimes did not work correctly.
Fixed issue with global functions and number parameters.
Added setting to force hostname usage.
Added setting to block unencrypted communication over port 40404.
Fixed issues with exporting logs from Peakboard Boxes.
Scope 'box:write' is now necessary for executing global functions on a Peakboard Box.
Direct Hub <-> API communication added.
Corrected typo in JSON and improved JWT date expiration display.
The endpoint ‘POST /v1/lists/list’ now expects correct JSON as content.
Updated style of Imprint and Privacy Policy.
Adjusted popup dialogs for better functionality on small screens.
Fixed missing distance between buttons for consistent layout.
Show the current system time alongside the timeserver of a Peakboard Box.
Fixed dropdown visibility issue when a box is in the last group.
Show the necessary hostname below the license.
Updated sidebar.
Reworked users page.
Implemented first iteration of Peakboard Hub File management.
Added functionality for uploading .pbmx files to boxes.
Implemented capability to create push notifications for alerts across multiple browsers and mobile devices.
Fixed issue with list cells displaying bindings from other user groups.
Implemented first iteration of Peakboard Hub Flows to support headless applications on the hub.
